overview:
Edi Poloniato oversees Kyriba’s new products and market strategy, with responsibility for defining new offerings, developing new markets on a worldwide basis and establishing new channels. Edi was a member of the original team that established Kyriba in Europe.

Edi has over 20 years’ experience in cash and treasury management. Prior to joining Kyriba, he worked as a director in the Global Transaction Division of Deutsche Bank, where he managed complex international treasury operations as the deputy head of cash management. Earlier in his career, he held executive sales and marketing positions at Helena Rubinstein and XRT.

Edi, who has dual French and Italian citizenship, is a graduate of the École Supérieure des Sciences Économiques et Commerciales (ESSEC), near Paris. He is based in Kyriba’s European Operations center in Paris.
